name: Bible Mode
description: Bible Mode is a Christian screen time app that helps you break phone addiction by requiring you to read Bible verses before unlocking apps. Features physical Bible scanning and claims 98% reduction in screen time.
seoTitle: FaithLock vs Bible Mode: Which Christian Screen Time App is Better? (2026 Comparison)
seoDescription: Comprehensive comparison of FaithLock and Bible Mode features, pricing, and effectiveness. See which faith-based app blocker helps you overcome phone addiction through Scripture.

name: Holy Focus
tagline: Block apps & pray - dopamine detox with Jesus
description: Holy Focus is a Christian screen time app that replaces distractions with daily prayer. Features 300+ handpicked prayers, Bible verses, and faith-based icons. Offers both time-slot and usage-based app blocking.
seoTitle: FaithLock vs Holy Focus: Honest Comparison of Christian App Blockers (2026)
seoDescription: Compare FaithLock and Holy Focus features, pricing, and user reviews. Find the best professional Christian screen time app without controversial ads.

name: Pray Screen Time
tagline: Pray before unlocking - Bible focus app
description: Pray Screen Time helps you pause, pray, and reflect before accessing selected apps. Available on both iOS and Android with daily Bible verses to inspire and guide users.
seoTitle: FaithLock vs Pray Screen Time: Which Christian App Blocker Works Better?
seoDescription: Detailed comparison of FaithLock and Pray Screen Time for breaking phone addiction. See features, pricing, and why FaithLock is the premium choice.

name: Bible Break
tagline: Screen time limit with gamified Bible reading
description: Bible Break gamifies Scripture reading by giving you 1 minute of screen time for every Bible verse you read. Unique approach combining app blocking with positive reinforcement.
seoTitle: FaithLock vs Bible Break: Comparison of Gamified Christian Screen Time Apps
seoDescription: Compare FaithLock's quiz system with Bible Break's gamified approach. Which Christian app blocker helps you overcome phone addiction more effectively?

name: One Sec
tagline: Take a deep breath before scrolling
description: One Sec is a secular screen time app that forces you to take a deep breath before opening addictive apps. Uses behavioral psychology to break the dopamine loop. No spiritual angle.
seoTitle: FaithLock vs One Sec: Christian Alternative to Secular Screen Time Apps
seoDescription: Why Christians choose FaithLock over One Sec. Compare features and see how Scripture-based app blocking transforms phone addiction into spiritual growth.
